com.mps.pearl.core

Class Resource

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mps.pearl.core.Resource

  • public class Resource
extends java.lang.Object
    This class act as Resource Pool for the system. It configure the Nodes read from the text file. It hold List of Nodes present in the system.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean add(Node node)
      Returns True, if the Node is successfully added, otherwise false.
      boolean addTerminatedNode(Node terminatedNode)
      Returns True, if the Node is successfully added to the terminated Node list.
      static Resource getInstance()
      Returns the unique Resource object associated with this System, if any.
      java.util.List<Node> getNodeList()
      Returns the List of Nodes in a System
      java.util.List<Node> getTerminatedNodeList()
      Returns the terminated List of Nodes in a System

      • addTerminatedNode

        public boolean addTerminatedNode(Node terminatedNode)
        Returns True, if the Node is successfully added to the terminated Node list. False, if the Node is not able to added into terminated list.
        Parameters:
        terminatedNode - the Node to be added into terminated Node list
        Returns:
        the state of added Node into terminated list.
